entities.name: 3D Viewer
entities.description: This tutorial illustrates the major features of the sap.ui.vk library which provides controls for the visualization and manipulation of 2D and 3D models in your browser

samples.name: Basic Map Container
samples.description: Shows a map with a transparent toolbar including a full screen button, a settings button and a selection mode menu.

samples.name: Basic Map Container with view switch
samples.description: In addition to the simple toolbar an additional segmented button for integrating a view switch is shown. The view switch can for example be used for switching between analytic and geomap or between map and charts.

samples.name: Basic Map Container with list panel
samples.description: In addition to the toolbar a list panel stack is shown on the map. The list panel stack can be used for a legend or application specific content.
